name: CVE-2021-22876
description: curl 7.1.1 to and including 7.75.0 is vulnerable to an "Exposure of Private Personal Information to an Unauthorized Actor" by leaking credentials in the HTTP Referer: header. libcurl does not strip off user credentials from the URL when automatically populating the Referer: HTTP request header field in outgoing HTTP requests, and therefore risks leaking sensitive data to the server that is the target of the second HTTP request.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:haxx:libcurl:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:32:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:33:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:34:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:solidfire:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_management_node:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:hci_storage_node:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:hci_compute_node:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:broadcom:fabric_operating_system:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_billing_and_revenue_management:12.0.0.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:essbase:21.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
